name.baseName: Pig production ; moderate scale specialized households ; feed raw materials production
养猪生产 ; 适度规模专业户 ; 饲料原料生产

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: In hilly areas and plain areas, professional households raise on a moderate scale. It provides about 19% of the commercial pigs and plays a major regulatory role in Sichuan's pig industry. The main scenarios and parameters of this pig raising scenario are: (1) 50% energy feed is mainly corn in the province, and protein feed is mainly concentrated feed; The other 50% feed is purchased at full price. The average weight was 80kg during 160 days of feeding. (2) The number of pigs raised by professional households fluctuates greatly with market changes, and the average number of pigs raised in this study is assumed to be 100 / year. 70% of the breeds are foreign two-hybrid pigs (cross-bred offspring between the two lines), the slaughter rate is 75%, 30% are foreign three-yuan (such as DLY), the slaughter rate is 76%, the whole feed meat ratio is 3.2:1; ③ Feeding management: pay more attention to the rational preparation of feed, but the environmental management is poor; (4) Waste treatment and utilization: Without treatment,40% is returned to the field (long-term storage accounts for 8%),60% is discharged to the surrounding environment, and the COD of the discharged water is 400mg/L.

丘陵区和平原区专业户适度规模饲养。提供了大约19%的商品猪,在四川养猪业中起着主要的调节作用。这种养猪情景的主要情景状态和设定参数为 ①50%能量饲料为本省玉米为主的谷物，蛋白饲料以购买浓缩饲料为主；另外50%饲料购买全价配合饲料。饲养期160d左右，出栏平均重量为80kg； ② 专业户养猪数量随着市场变化波动很大，本研究假设平均出栏数为100头/年·户。品种70%为洋二杂猪（两品系外种猪间杂交后代），屠宰率75%，30%为洋三元（如DLY), 屠宰率76%,全程料肉比3.2:1 ;③饲养管理:比较注重饲料合理配制,但环境管理 较差;④粪便处理及利用:未进行处理,40%还田(长期存贮量占8%),60%排放到周边环境,排出水COD为400mg/L。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: In this study, the functional unit (FU) was defined as "1kg pig carcass", which included skin, bone and fat. Foreign studies generally only considered lean meat, but in China's consumption mode, skin and viscera were also fully utilized as edible foods. The concept of carcass was adopted in this study. Although the bone included in this study is an inedible part, it can play a certain compensative role because it does not contain internal organs. In addition, the current data can be easily converted into carcass weight, so it is more in line with the actual situation.

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The average level of energy consumption and the amount of fertilizer, pesticide and mulch used in feed raw materials production in Sichuan Province was calculated according to China Statistical Yearbook 2006.
饲料原料生产的能量消耗和化肥、农药、地膜等使用量按《中国统计年鉴2006》计算四川平均水平。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Since the agricultural resource consumption is allocated according to the occupied land, the specific crop yield is no longer considered in scenario A, and the concentrated feed and the full-priced feed under various scenarios are converted into equivalent land area according to the corresponding average yield of main grains in the whole country or Sichuan province according to the set two situations.
由于本文按占用土地进行农资消耗分配，情景A中不再考虑具体的作物产量，各种情景下的浓缩饲料和全价饲料均按设定的两种情况按相应的全国或四川省内主要谷物平均产量折算成相当的土地面积。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Soybean meal (70%) and rapeseed meal (10%) were analyzed in concentrate, and other components were not considered. The components of the full price feed are mainly corn based grains (70%) and soybean meal (25%), and the other components are not considered. Minerals, disinfectants and various small equipment facilities are not included.
浓缩料中分析豆粕（70%）、菜籽粕（10%），其余成分没有考虑。全价饲料的成分主要是玉米为主的谷物（70%）和豆粕（25%），其余成分没有考虑。没有包括矿物质、消毒剂和各种小型设备设施。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The data represents the pig production process in Sichuan, China, specifically within specialized households of moderate scale located in hilly and plain areas. The pigs are raised primarily for producing commercial pork with an emphasis on the balance of energy and protein in their feed, which consists of locally sourced corn and purchased concentrated feed, supplemented by full-priced formulated feed. It outlines a typical scenario where pig breeds are predominantly foreign hybrids, with specific slaughter rates and a feed to meat conversion ratio provided. This data can be utilized for environmental impact assessments within the realms of agricultural and food industries, especially focusing on sustainable pig farming practices.
该数据代表了中国四川省的养猪生产过程，特别是在丘陵和平原区域中等规模的专业户养猪。目的是生产商业猪肉，强调饲料中能量和蛋白的平衡，由本地玉米和购买的浓缩饲料为主，辅以全价配合饲料。涵盖了以洋杂交猪为主的典型养殖场景、具体的屠宰率和饲料转换肉的比例。该数据可用于农业和食品工业领域的环境影响评估，尤其是专注于可持续猪肉养殖实践。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: This study combined LCA methodology and scenario analysis method to conduct systematic environmental impact assessment for three typical pig production scenarios in Sichuan, explore the specific algorithms applied to the current environmental impact assessment of pig production, and reveal the environmentally friendly and unfavorable aspects of various pig production systems and their non-renewable energy utilization efficiency. The results are helpful to the understanding of environmental impact of pig industry and provide reference for the establishment of sustainable development model of pig industry.
本研究采用LCA方法学和情景分析法相结合的方式对四川三种典型的养猪生产 情景进行系统的环境影响评估，探索这种分析方法应用于当前养猪生产环境影响评估 时的具体算法，并揭示各种养猪生产系统中的环境友好和不利方面以及其不可更新能 源利用效率。研究结果有助于对养猪业环境影响态势的认识，并为养猪可持续发展模 式的建立提供参考。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: 1) The basic situation of Sichuan pig industry and the setting of various scenarios in this study, on the one hand, the opinions of a number of pig experts in Sichuan Province were solicited, and on the other hand, field investigations were carried out. 2) The relevant data in crop production are mainly from the 2005 statistics given in the annual yearbook. The production data of feed raw materials in Sichuan and the national average data are used to distinguish the two cases of raw materials coming from within the province and outside the province.
1）本研究中四川养猪业的基本情况和各种情景的设定，一方面征求了四川省多位养猪专家的意见，另一方面进行了实地调查。2）作物生产中的相关数据主要来自年年鉴中给出的2005年统计数据。四川的饲料原料生产数据和全国的平均数据用于区分原料来自省内和省外两种情况。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: The production data of feed raw materials in Sichuan and the national average data are used to distinguish the two cases of raw materials coming from within the province and outside the province. The consumption of agricultural materials is calculated according to the corresponding raw material consumption and the average yield of main grains in the whole country or Sichuan Province, and then calculated according to the area. Due to the large differences in the feed formulations used in the three scenarios, the assumption of the proportion of main raw material consumption was made, and then adjusted according to the sample survey data.
四川的饲料原料生产数据和全国的平均数据用于区分原料来自省内和省外两种情况。农资消耗量按相应的原料消耗量和全国或四川省内主要谷物平均产量折算成相当的土地面积，再按面积求得。由于三种情景中所用的饲料配方差异大，故进行了主要原料消耗比例的假设，然后根据抽样调查资料进行了调整。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 白林. 四川养猪业清洁生产系统LCA及猪粪资源化利用关键技术研究. (四川农业大学, 2007).
白林. 四川养猪业清洁生产系统LCA及猪粪资源化利用关键技术研究. (四川农业大学, 2007).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When applying this data set in a Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), users should note that it has been framed within the specific context of Sichuan's pig farming practices. The data is not designed to be universally applicable but rather contextualized for localized agricultural inputs and outputs. For LCA modeling, it is advised to take into consideration the particularities of feed composition, regional resource consumption patterns, and waste treatment practices highlighted in the data. It is essential to not extrapolate these findings to dissimilar agricultural contexts without appropriate adjustments. Caution should be used when attempting to generalize the environmental impact results to other regions or scales of operation.
在应用该数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）时，用户应注意它是在四川省养猪实践的具体背景下构建的。这些数据不是设计为普遍适用的，而是为了本地化的农业投入和产出而加以情景化。在LCA建模时，建议考虑数据中强调的饲料成分特性、区域资源消耗模式和废弃物处理实践的特定性。在没有适当调整的情况下，不应将这些发现外推到不同的农业环境中。在尝试将环境影响结果概括应用到其他地区或运营规模时应谨慎行事。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 作为参考定量，非实际输出
